entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bella Coola
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:01 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Coola Airport 11:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: SSE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to a few flurries near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 8:09 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
